data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Cost Report'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_COST_REP
  as select from    ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEADER_INVOICE as InvoiceHeader
    left outer join I_JournalEntry                as JournalEntry     on JournalEntry.Reference2InDocumentHeader = InvoiceHeader.filen
    left outer join I_JournalEntryItem            as JournalEntryItem on  JournalEntryItem.SourceLedger       = '0L'
                                                                      and JournalEntryItem.CompanyCode        = JournalEntry.CompanyCode
                                                                      and JournalEntryItem.FiscalYear         = JournalEntry.FiscalYear
                                                                      and JournalEntryItem.AccountingDocument = JournalEntry.AccountingDocument
                                                                      and JournalEntryItem.GLAccount          = ''
  //and JournalEntryItem.GLAccountText      = 'T'

{
  key InvoiceHeader.filen,
  key InvoiceHeader.BillingDocument,
      InvoiceHeader.expty,
      InvoiceHeader.expty_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.bukrs,
      InvoiceHeader.bukrs_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.descr,
      InvoiceHeader.bldat,
      InvoiceHeader.extco,
      InvoiceHeader.extco_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.extrg,
      InvoiceHeader.desco,
      InvoiceHeader.desco_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.desrg,
      InvoiceHeader.pymty,
      InvoiceHeader.pymty_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.trnty,
      InvoiceHeader.trnty_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.cuscd,
      InvoiceHeader.cuscd_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.cofrp,
      InvoiceHeader.cusof,
      InvoiceHeader.cusof_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.sfrrp,
      InvoiceHeader.shpfr,
      InvoiceHeader.shpfr_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.bfrrp,
      InvoiceHeader.brofr,
      InvoiceHeader.brofr_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.extfn,
      InvoiceHeader.rexdt,
      InvoiceHeader.cedno,
      InvoiceHeader.ceddt,
      InvoiceHeader.shpdt,
      InvoiceHeader.shpno,
      InvoiceHeader.extdt,
      InvoiceHeader.desdt,
      InvoiceHeader.nopck,
      InvoiceHeader.clsed,
      InvoiceHeader.fldel,
      InvoiceHeader.chind,
      InvoiceHeader.bankl,
      InvoiceHeader.iban,
      InvoiceHeader.BankName,
      InvoiceHeader.BankBranch,
      InvoiceHeader.kunrg,
      InvoiceHeader.kunrg_txt,
      InvoiceHeader.inc01,
      InvoiceHeader.inc02,
      InvoiceHeader.lcnum,
      InvoiceHeader.plaka,
      InvoiceHeader.snrkp,
      InvoiceHeader.ucsno,
      InvoiceHeader.ucstr,
      InvoiceHeader.hzrtr,
      InvoiceHeader.beyts,
      InvoiceHeader.beysa,
      InvoiceHeader.beyty,
      InvoiceHeader.hatbl,
      InvoiceHeader.gemia,
      InvoiceHeader.sefno,
      InvoiceHeader.sbeyt,
      InvoiceHeader.bolnumber,
      InvoiceHeader.brgew,
      InvoiceHeader.ntgew,
      InvoiceHeader.gewei,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure : 'gewei'
      InvoiceHeader.volum,
      InvoiceHeader.voleh,
      InvoiceHeader.erdat,
      InvoiceHeader.ernam,
      InvoiceHeader.erzet,
      InvoiceHeader.aedat,
      InvoiceHeader.aezet,
      InvoiceHeader.aenam,
      InvoiceHeader.reffn,
      InvoiceHeader.incno,
      InvoiceHeader.FileExportNumber,
      InvoiceHeader.CompanyCode,
      InvoiceHeader.CompanyCodeName,
      InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentType,
      InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentTypeName,
      InvoiceHeader.SalesOrganization,
      InvoiceHeader.SalesOrganizationName,
      InvoiceHeader.DistributionChannel,
      InvoiceHeader.DistributionChannelName,
      InvoiceHeader.Division,
      InvoiceHeader.DivisionName,
      InvoiceHeader.PayerParty,
      InvoiceHeader.PayerPartyName,
      InvoiceHeader.SoldToParty,
      InvoiceHeader.SoldToPartyName,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      InvoiceHeader.TotalNetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      InvoiceHeader.TotalTaxAmount,
      InvoiceHeader.TransactionCurrency,
      InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentDate,
      InvoiceHeader.DocumentReferenceID,
      InvoiceHeader.CustomerPaymentTerms,
      InvoiceHeader.CustomerPaymentTermsName,
      InvoiceHeader.IncotermsClassification,
      InvoiceHeader.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      InvoiceHeader.IncotermsVersion,
      InvoiceHeader.CreationDate,
      InvoiceHeader.CreationTime,
      InvoiceHeader.CreatedByUser,
      InvoiceHeader.AccountingTransferStatus,
      InvoiceHeader.AccountingTransferStatusText,
      JournalEntryItem.AccountingDocument,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      sum ( JournalEntryItem.AmountInTransactionCurrency ) as AmountInTransactionCurrency

}
group by
  InvoiceHeader.filen,
  InvoiceHeader.BillingDocument,
  InvoiceHeader.expty,
  InvoiceHeader.expty_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.bukrs,
  InvoiceHeader.bukrs_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.descr,
  InvoiceHeader.bldat,
  InvoiceHeader.extco,
  InvoiceHeader.extco_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.extrg,
  InvoiceHeader.desco,
  InvoiceHeader.desco_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.desrg,
  InvoiceHeader.pymty,
  InvoiceHeader.pymty_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.trnty,
  InvoiceHeader.trnty_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.cuscd,
  InvoiceHeader.cuscd_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.cofrp,
  InvoiceHeader.cusof,
  InvoiceHeader.cusof_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.sfrrp,
  InvoiceHeader.shpfr,
  InvoiceHeader.shpfr_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.bfrrp,
  InvoiceHeader.brofr,
  InvoiceHeader.brofr_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.extfn,
  InvoiceHeader.rexdt,
  InvoiceHeader.cedno,
  InvoiceHeader.ceddt,
  InvoiceHeader.shpdt,
  InvoiceHeader.shpno,
  InvoiceHeader.extdt,
  InvoiceHeader.desdt,
  InvoiceHeader.nopck,
  InvoiceHeader.clsed,
  InvoiceHeader.fldel,
  InvoiceHeader.chind,
  InvoiceHeader.bankl,
  InvoiceHeader.iban,
  InvoiceHeader.BankName,
  InvoiceHeader.BankBranch,
  InvoiceHeader.kunrg,
  InvoiceHeader.kunrg_txt,
  InvoiceHeader.inc01,
  InvoiceHeader.inc02,
  InvoiceHeader.lcnum,
  InvoiceHeader.plaka,
  InvoiceHeader.snrkp,
  InvoiceHeader.ucsno,
  InvoiceHeader.ucstr,
  InvoiceHeader.hzrtr,
  InvoiceHeader.beyts,
  InvoiceHeader.beysa,
  InvoiceHeader.beyty,
  InvoiceHeader.hatbl,
  InvoiceHeader.gemia,
  InvoiceHeader.sefno,
  InvoiceHeader.sbeyt,
  InvoiceHeader.bolnumber,
  InvoiceHeader.brgew,
  InvoiceHeader.ntgew,
  InvoiceHeader.gewei,
  InvoiceHeader.volum,
  InvoiceHeader.voleh,
  InvoiceHeader.erdat,
  InvoiceHeader.ernam,
  InvoiceHeader.erzet,
  InvoiceHeader.aedat,
  InvoiceHeader.aezet,
  InvoiceHeader.aenam,
  InvoiceHeader.reffn,
  InvoiceHeader.incno,
  InvoiceHeader.FileExportNumber,
  InvoiceHeader.CompanyCode,
  InvoiceHeader.CompanyCodeName,
  InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentType,
  InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentTypeName,
  InvoiceHeader.SalesOrganization,
  InvoiceHeader.SalesOrganizationName,
  InvoiceHeader.DistributionChannel,
  InvoiceHeader.DistributionChannelName,
  InvoiceHeader.Division,
  InvoiceHeader.DivisionName,
  InvoiceHeader.PayerParty,
  InvoiceHeader.PayerPartyName,
  InvoiceHeader.SoldToParty,
  InvoiceHeader.SoldToPartyName,
  InvoiceHeader.TotalNetAmount,
  InvoiceHeader.TotalTaxAmount,
  InvoiceHeader.TransactionCurrency,
  InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentDate,
  InvoiceHeader.DocumentReferenceID,
  InvoiceHeader.CustomerPaymentTerms,
  InvoiceHeader.CustomerPaymentTermsName,
  InvoiceHeader.IncotermsClassification,
  InvoiceHeader.IncotermsTransferLocation,
  InvoiceHeader.IncotermsVersion,
  InvoiceHeader.CreationDate,
  InvoiceHeader.CreationTime,
  InvoiceHeader.CreatedByUser,
  InvoiceHeader.AccountingTransferStatus,
  InvoiceHeader.AccountingTransferStatusText,
  JournalEntryItem.AccountingDocument
/*+[internal] {

],
